Auckland ferry cuts through SailGP practice causing drivers to swerve https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-ferry-cuts-through-sail-gp-practice-causing-drivers-to-swerve/CA37EFSVTVHJ7EDZENKSM3MFAM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-ferry-cuts-through-sail-gp-practice-causing-drivers-to-swerve/CA37EFSVTVHJ7EDZENKSM3MFAM/ Auckland Transport says the ferry had right of way and slowed down. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 00:19:53 +0000 A passenger ferry cuts across the fleet during a practice session ahead of SailGP's debut event in Auckland. Photo / Bob Martin, SailGP.
Weather: Thunderstorms, torrential downpours for Northland, MetService issues alerts for Auckland, Coromandel, Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-thunderstorms-torrential-downpours-for-northland-metservice-issues-alerts-for-auckland-coromandel-gisborne/W6MP4RWUCNFK5A43FRYLGMBVW4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-thunderstorms-torrential-downpours-for-northland-metservice-issues-alerts-for-auckland-coromandel-gisborne/W6MP4RWUCNFK5A43FRYLGMBVW4/ Raphael Franks Civil Defence has warned people to keep watch on the incoming storm due from 3pm today. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 22:41:15 +0000 Severe thunderstorms and downpours of up to 6cm of rain an hour are forecast overnight in Northland. Photo / MetService
Du Val entity funnelled $6.7m to eight affiliates amid $4.6m tax debt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/banking-finance/du-val-entity-funnelled-67m-to-eight-affiliates-amid-46m-tax-debt/7DIS6L7OARGUHHH6PWJY4C3O3M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/banking-finance/du-val-entity-funnelled-67m-to-eight-affiliates-amid-46m-tax-debt/7DIS6L7OARGUHHH6PWJY4C3O3M/ Duncan BridgemanThe loans were made to eight Du Val entities and were all unsecured. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Police went into the Du Val owners' property in Remuera on August 2, 2024. Photo / Alex Burton
Claire Trevett: Christopher Luxon showed some ruthlessness in demoting Shane Reti in reshuffle but did he go far enough? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/claire-trevett-christopher-luxon-showed-some-ruthless-in-demoting-shane-reti-in-reshuffle-but-did-he-go-足够远/DTGUBGH32ZBE3BOITL2IR32MVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/claire-trevett-christopher-luxon-showed-some-ruthless-in-demoting-shane-reti-in-reshuffle-but-did-he-go-足够远/DTGUBGH32ZBE3BOITL2IR32MVQ/ Claire TrevettThe Prime Minister's reshuffle was much needed but some ministers got off too lightly.
